0.text: Innate - Frost Shot: Ashe's basic attacks and ability hits apply Frost to enemies for 2 seconds, which  slows them by 20% − 30% (based on level) for the duration. Basic attacks against enemies with Frost are modified to deal 110% (+ (75% +  35%) of critical strike chance) damage.
0.html: Innate - Frost Shot: Ashe's basic attacks and ability hits apply Frost to enemies for 2 seconds, which slows them by 20% − 30% (based on level) for the duration. Basic attacks against enemies with Frost are modified to deal 110% (+ (75% +  35%) of critical strike chance) damage.
markedPassages: slows
(+ (75% +  35%) of critical strike chance)
35%

1.text: Innate - Critical Slow: Ashe's  critical strikes do not deal any additional damage, instead they double Frost's slow strength to 40% − 60% (based on level), decaying over 1 second to its normal strength.
1.html: Innate - Critical Slow: Ashe's critical strikes do not deal any additional damage, instead they double Frost's slow strength to 40% − 60% (based on level), decaying over 1 second to its normal strength.
markedPassages: critical strikes

0.text: Passive: While Ranger's Focus is inactive, Ashe's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Focus for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent attacks and stacks up to 4 times. Stacks expire by one every 1 second.
0.html: Passive: While Ranger's Focus is inactive, Ashe's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Focus for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent attacks and stacks up to 4 times. Stacks expire by one every 1 second.

1.text: Active: For 4 seconds, Ashe gains  bonus attack speed and empowers her basic attacks to fire a flurry of five arrows.
1.html: Active: For 4 seconds, Ashe gains  bonus attack speed and empowers her basic attacks to fire a flurry of five arrows.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

2.text: Each arrow deals modified physical damage that benefits from  Frost Shot and  life steal. Flurries apply on-hit effects only once.
2.html: Each arrow deals modified physical damage that benefits from Frost Shot and  life steal. Flurries apply on-hit effects only once.
markedPassages: Frost Shot
life steal

3.text: Ranger's Focus  resets Ashe's basic attack timer.
3.html: Ranger's Focus resets Ashe's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Ranger's Focus  resets Ashe's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Ashe shoots a volley of arrows in a cone in the target direction, each dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit, and applying  Critical Slow to enemy  champions hit.
0.html: Active: Ashe shoots a volley of arrows in a cone in the target direction, each dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit, and applying Critical Slow to enemy champions hit.
markedPassages: Critical Slow
champions

1.text: Enemies can intercept multiple arrows but do not take damage from any beyond the first.
1.html: Enemies can intercept multiple arrows but do not take damage from any beyond the first.

0.text: Active: Ashe sends a hawk spirit toward the target location, granting  sight of the area along its path「 repeatedly for 0.5 seconds after every 100 units traveled 」「 for effectively up-to 1.8 seconds at any location 」and at its destination for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ashe sends a hawk spirit toward the target location, granting sight of the area along its path「 repeatedly for 0.5 seconds after every 100 units traveled 」「 for effectively up-to 1.8 seconds at any location 」and at its destination for 5 seconds.

1.text: Ashe periodically stocks a Hawkshot charge, up to a maximum of 2.
1.html: Ashe periodically stocks a Hawkshot charge, up to a maximum of 2.

0.text: Active: Ashe fires a massive arrow of ice in the target direction, granting  sight of the area it flies through each for 1 second. The arrow shatters upon hitting an enemy  champion, dealing them magic damage,  stunning them for 1 − 3.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds, and granting  sight of the area around them for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Ashe fires a massive arrow of ice in the target direction, granting sight of the area it flies through each for 1 second. The arrow shatters upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing them magic damage, stunning them for 1 − 3.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds, and granting sight of the area around them for 1 second.
markedPassages: sight
champion
stunning
